channel.title: Who is your favorite DBZ Character?
channel.description:
Mine would have to be 2.
Vegeta [img]http://images.gametrailers.com/images/userposters/123361-2703-VegetaMBgt2.jpg[/img]
I've always believed Vegeta is the strongest character in DBZ. He cant use kaioken, but he can go Super Saiyan 5.
Majin Buu [img]http://www.bobstr.id.au/School/majin_buu.jpg[/img]
Any of the the Buu forms i like. He is the strongest Character In DBZ, Besides Goku. He can absorb you or turn you into candy, along with tremendously strong attacks, He is a beast.
Who is your favorite DBZ character. Pic and Why

item.title: Who is your favorite DBZ Character?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Can’t really remember why, but it was definitely Gotenks and Goku (obviously). Nothing beats Gotenks in SS3 using the Super Ghost Kamikaze Attack.

Read full topic

item.title: Who is your favorite DBZ Character?
item.dc:creator: @towriss towriss
item.description:
@towriss wrote:

[quote=“Errorist, post:2, topic:358553”]I’d say Vegeta too.

They always let him get beat up by the villains to showcase their strength and then give all the glory to Goku at the end of the saga / movie. I wish the stories would’ve been changed up more than they were.[/quote][quote=“Errorist, post:2, topic:358553”]I’d say Vegeta too.

They always let him get beat up by the villains to showcase their strength and then give all the glory to Goku at the end of the saga / movie. I wish the stories would’ve been changed up more than they were.[/quote]true

Read full topic
item.source: Who is your favorite DBZ Character?
